Source_Event_IDs.description: All original event IDs from various sources (e.g., IDMC 'event_id'). If only one source provides an ID, this array will have a single string.

Event_Name.description: An array of event names (e.g., 'event_name'). If multiple sources differ, all unique names are retained.

Event_Type.description: An array of event/displacement types (e.g., 'displacement_type'). If multiple sources differ, all unique variations are retained.

Country.description: An array of country names. If multiple sources differ, all unique names are retained.

Country_Code.description: An array of ISO3 country codes (e.g., 'iso3'). If multiple sources differ, all unique codes are retained.

Location.description: A list of sub-national locations or admin areas (e.g., 'locations_name'). If multiple sources differ, all are included.

Latitude.description: Array of latitude values (e.g., 'latitude'). If multiple coordinates differ, all are included.

Longitude.description: Array of longitude values (e.g., 'longitude'). If multiple coordinates differ, all are included.

Date.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time (e.g., 'displacement_date'). If sources differ, you may store one or eventually keep multiple values.

Year.description: Year extracted from the event date (e.g., 'year'). If multiple years differ, you may store one or convert this field to an array if needed.

Population_Affected.description: Number of people affected or displaced (e.g., 'figure'). A single integer derived from multiple sources if needed.

Source.description: List of sources that contributed to this record (e.g., 'sources').

Comments.description: Array of comments or notes (e.g., 'standard_info_text'). If multiple sources differ, all are retained.

External_Links.description: URLs or references to external resources (e.g., 'source_url'). If multiple sources differ, all are included.
